heroSection.description: As a React-specialized developer, I effectively design websites and apps that combine user-friendliness and modern technologies.

1.title: Kanban Join
1.description: Task management inspired by the Kanban system. Create and assign tasks using drag-and-drop functions, assign users and categories.

2.title: Pollo Loco
2.description: Jump, run and throw game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe find coins and Tabasco salsa to win against the crazy chicken.

3.title: Pokedex
3.description: Based on the PokéAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogs Pokémon information.

4.title: Ring of Fire
4.description: Ring of Fire is a party game in which the participants have to draw cards and perform tasks.

5.title: Old portfolio page
5.description: Old portfolio: A compact and efficient Angular-based web presentation of my skills and projects as a front-end developer.

aboutMe.description: Hi, I'm Eugen, a passionate frontend developer with a focus on JavaScript, React and Angular. My passion is developing innovative web applications. In my spare time I dedicate myself to creative projects and continuously learning new technologies to keep my skills sharp and up to date.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.intro: I look forward to hearing from you! Contact me, and let's find out together how we can realize your vision.
contact.termsAcceptance: I accept the terms and conditions.
